thread.title: Steven Lyon
thread.title_full: Nevada Corporate Headquarters, Inc. reviewed by Steven Lyon

author: Steven Lyon
title: Steven Lyon
text: Shannon was very helpful for getting an issue resolved with the State of Nevada regarding my LLC where the State had not been able to process my payment for the prior year and were considering my company delinquent for non-payment. She interacted with the State on behalf of my company and was able to quickly resolve the issue. Thanks.
